problem_names: lemma surj_TM: "v = val tm \<Longrightarrow> t = time tm \<Longrightarrow> tm = TM v t"
lemma val_bind_tm[simp]: "val (bind_tm m f) = (let x = val m in val(f x))"
lemma val_let: "val (let x = t in f(x)) = (let x = t in val(f x))"
lemma let_id: "(let x = t in x) = t"

lemmas val_simps =
  val_return
  val_bind_tm
  val_tick
  val_let
  let_id
  if_distrib[of val]
  prod.case_distrib[of val]
translations: lemma surj_TM: "v = val tm \<Longrightarrow> t = time tm \<Longrightarrow> tm = TM v t"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>v = Time_Monad.val tm; t = time tm\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> tm = TM v t
text\<open>The following lemmas push @{const val} into a monadic term:\<close>

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Time_Monad.val (return x) = x
lemma val_bind_tm[simp]: "val (bind_tm m f) = (let x = val m in val(f x))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Time_Monad.val (m \<bind> f) =
    (let x = Time_Monad.val m in Time_Monad.val (f x))

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Time_Monad.val (tick x) = x
lemma val_let: "val (let x = t in f(x)) = (let x = t in val(f x))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Time_Monad.val (Let t f) = (let x = t in Time_Monad.val (f x))
lemma let_id: "(let x = t in x) = t"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (let x = t in x) = t

lemmas val_simps =
  val_return
  val_bind_tm
  val_tick
  val_let
  let_id
  if_distrib[of val]
  prod.case_distrib[of val]
